| dinamo - bucureşti |          12 |              32 | 20         |          109 |              213 | 104           |

| bristol shoguns    |          11 |              12 | 1          |          128 |               99 | + 29          |
| treorchy           |          10 |              23 | 13         |           72 |              178 | 106           |

- For "points against dinamo - bucureşti":

  - Claim states: 213

Both conditions stated in the claim are exactly what is presented in the table for dinamo - bucureşti.
